create database phamacy;

create table medicines(
	barcode varchar(50),
    medicine_name varchar(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (barcode) 
);

create table medicine_details(
	id int not null AUTO_INCREMENT,
    barcode varchar(50),
    medicine_code varchar(50),
    company_name varchar(100),
    size varchar(50),
    medicine_type int,
    lot_no	varchar(30),
    back_stock int,
    front_stock int,
    buying_date datetime,
    buying_price float,
    selling_price float,
    stock_type int,
    amount int,
    unit varchar(20),
    pack_price float,
    pack_amount int,
    initialize_date datetime,
    expired_date datetime,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)  
);

create table sell_histories(
	id int not null AUTO_INCREMENT,
    barcode varchar(50),
    lot_no	varchar(30),
    selling_date dateTime,
    amount int not null,
    discount varchar(20),
    total float not null,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

create table buy_histories(
	id int not null AUTO_INCREMENT,
    barcode varchar(50),
    lot_no	varchar(30),
    buying_date dateTime,
    amount int not null,
    total float not null,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);
